title: ETM brings its transverse flux motor technology to robotics
description:
ETM said its TFM technology enables OEMs to simplify mechanical designs, reduce costs, and achieve performance benchmarks.

The post ETM brings its transverse flux motor technology to robotics appeared first on The Robot Report.
